text: An osiziriba men akakagha dar mɨngaribav gɨa ghaze, “Krais mɨzazim inigh aremegh ua dɨkavamin mɨgɨrɨgɨam, a guizbangɨra.” Egha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Iesusɨn kɨ akam akurir kamnagh, a Gumazir God Ua Gumazamiziba Iniasa Mɨsevezim, a Krais.”(17:3) Mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim, Krais, kamaghɨn ghu, “God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim.”
